Uses of Package
org.melior.context.transaction

  • Packages that use org.melior.context.transaction 
    Package Description
    org.melior.context.transaction  
    org.melior.logging.appender  
    org.melior.logging.core  
    org.melior.service.work  
  • Classes in org.melior.context.transaction used by org.melior.context.transaction 
    Class and Description
    Argument
    An argument that may be added to the transaction context of a thread during the processing of a transaction.
    TransactionContext
    Implements a transaction context for a thread to track the current transaction that is being processed by the thread.
  • Classes in org.melior.context.transaction used by org.melior.logging.appender 
    Class and Description
    Argument
    An argument that may be added to the transaction context of a thread during the processing of a transaction.
  • Classes in org.melior.context.transaction used by org.melior.logging.core 
    Class and Description

    Implements a transaction context for a thread to track the current transaction that is being processed by the thread.
  • Classes in org.melior.context.transaction used by org.melior.service.work 
    Class and Description
    TransactionContext
    Implements a transaction context for a thread to track the current transaction that is being processed by the thread.
